Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text with reference to a ship captain as in the hieratic labels for oil and incense.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393487) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393487)
